addon_description.message: Changes the JS-API for modifying <canvas> to prevent Canvas-Fingerprinting.

allowPDFCanvas_description.message: Firefox's native PDF reader uses the API to display PDF content. If too many ask dialogs appear or the PDF reader does not work at all, these have to be allowed.

askForInvisiblePermission.message: Do you want to allow invisible <canvas>?

askForInvisibleInputPermission.message: Do you want to allow invisible <canvas> input?

askForInvisibleReadoutPermission.message: Do you want to allow invisible <canvas> readout?

askForPermission.message: Do you want to allow <canvas> input?

askForReadoutPermission.message: Do you want to allow <canvas> readout?

askForVisiblePermission.message: Do you want to allow the red bordered <canvas>?
Do you want to allow input in the red bordered <canvas>?

askForVisibleReadoutPermission.message: Do you want to allow the readout of the red bordered <canvas>?

askOnlyOnce_description.message: When Canvas Blocker's Block mode is set to 'ask permission' or 'ask permission for readout API', a confirm message will appear every time a page tries to access the API or readout API. This setting tries to display the confirm message only once for each page regardless of how many times the page tries to access the API. Nevertheless, multiple confirm messages may still be displayed on some pages.

blackList_description.message: Domains or URLs where the <canvas>-API should always be blocked. To add multiple entries, separate them by commas.

minFakeSize_description.message:
Canvas with a smaller or equal area than this number will not be faked. This is a parameter to prevent detection.
CAUTION: This lowers the safety of the addon, therefore it is highly recommended not to set this value above 100.

maxFakeSize_description.message:
Canvas with a bigger area than this number will not be faked. (Enter zero to disable.) This is a performance parameter that can prevent browser freezes and should be adjusted to the computing power of the device.
CAUTION: This lowers the safety of the addon, therefore it is highly recommended not to set this value below 100 000.

rng_description.message:
non persistent: the random numbers will be determined freshly for each faking action.
persistent: the random number will only be determined once for every domain.

persistentRndStorage_description.message: Stores the data for the persistent random number generator for usage after restart.

storePersistentRnd_description.message: If data for the persistent random number generator should be stored.

clearPersistentRnd_description.message: Deletes all data for the persistent random number generator.

ignoreList_description.message: Domains or URLs where no notification will be shown. To add multiple entries, separate them by commas.

inputIgnoreDomain.message: Input domain to add to ignore list:

inputWhitelistDomain.message: Input URL RegExp to add to white list:

inputWhitelistURL.message: Input domain to add to white list:

showNotifications_description.message: Show a notification when the block mode is set to "fake readout API".

notificationDisplayTime_description.message: Number of seconds the notifications are shown. (Enter zero to disable automatic closing.)

stackList_description.message: JS files which are allowed to use the <canvas>-API. The input has to be in JSON format. Example: [{"url": "http://domain/file1.js"}, {"url": "http://domain/file2.js", "line": 1, "column": 4, "stackPosition": -3}]

whiteList_description.message: Domains or URLs where the <canvas>-API should not be blocked. To add multiple entries, separate them by commas.

storeImageForInspection_description.message:
Enables the storage of the content of the faked canvas.
CAUTION: This may lead to a lot of memory consumption.
